TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AssemblyCatalog extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartCatalog implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement
Public Class AssemblyCatalog Inherits ComposablePartCatalog Implements ICompositionElement
type AssemblyCatalog = class inherit ComposablePartCatalog interface ICompositionElement

summary.span: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.

span.span: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于分析所有中指定的程序集存在的各个部分。An is used to parse all the parts present in a specified assembly. 通过对象引用或路径，可以指示目标程序集。The target assembly can be indicated either by object reference or by path. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 此类型是线程安全的。This type is thread safe. ## Examples 下面的代码演示的常见方案的应用程序创建分析自己的程序集。The following code demonstrates the common scenario of an application creating an to parse its own assembly. 这是加载单个项目中包含到 Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) 部件的简单方式。This is a straightforward way to load parts contained in a single project into the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF). [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]
